nodes.text: The power control room was the operations center for the control and distribution of power to both the Senate Building and Senate Office Building on Coruscant. During the Senate hostage crisis, members of Cad Bane's group entered the room to cut off the power to the Senate Building. The room was occupied by a R5 unit, a 3PO-series protocol droid, a WED-15 Treadwell droid, and an LEP servant droid at the time. An IG-86 sentinel droid entered and destroyed all the droids in the room, allowing Robonino to cut off the power.
